name: Getting Up
description:
Getting up is a literal and figurative ascending. As you are climbing out of this mysterious cave, you are fixing the way you're seeing your surroundings and bring back your taste for living.


Credits

Game Design - Slow Brainers

Art - Jon Cote

Level Design - Erwan Maupas

Audio and Sound Design - Adam Chikh

Programming - Mathias Theys and Alain Sass
